body:
Dear Radiancors,

May I ask how to specify the path and name of the .hdr file as generated by
rad when constructing rad command?

As far as I know, the options of rad such as PICTURE, RAWFILE, etc only
specify the "root name" of certain files generated in the process.

Thanks!

Ji
